computed-native.name: Native Computed Values
computed-native.description: Automatic dependency tracking for derived values using native computed/memo constructs

selectors.name: Selector Pattern
selectors.description: Manual derived state using selector functions

async-reactive.name: Reactive Async
async-reactive.description: Async computations that automatically recompute when dependencies change

batching-native.description: Built-in update batching to reduce notification overhead

middleware.name: Middleware System
middleware.description: Plugin system for extending functionality (logging, persistence, etc.)
